title: My first blog: Hexo + Github Pages
content:
This is my first blog!

1. Intro to Hexo

The official website is https://hexo.io/zh-cn/. It is a swift, clear and efficient frame of blog.

More themes can be found at https://hexo.io/themes/.

2. Environment Setup

Install Homebrew

/bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)"

Install Node.js

brew install node

Install Git

brew install git

Install Hexo

npm install -g hexo-cli

3. Setup a blog with Hexo

  1. New a folder named “blog”
  2. Initialize a blog with Hexo
    1. Enter “blog” folder cd blog
    2. Initialize: hexo init
    3. Launch hexo: hexo s
    4. A new blog is created: http://localhost:4000
    5. New a blog article: hexo n article name
    6. hexo clean & hexo g & hexo s

4. Deploy to Github

  1. New repository: ‘username.github.io’
  2. In folder blog, install the git deploy plugin:
    npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
  3. In folder blog, in setup of _config.yml
    (username is the repo name)
    Deployment
    ## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html
deploy:
  type: git
  repo: https://github.com/username/username.github.io.git
  branch: master
  4. Deploy to far-end
    hexo d
    Attention: Password is required when deploying. In the recent version of github, token of github account was required rather than the password.

5. Selection and Setup of the Theme

  1. Select the theme in https://hexo.io/themes/
  2. Install the theme with the tutorial of the theme
  3. In _config.yml, modify the theme to
    # Extensions
## Plugins: https://hexo.io/plugins/
## Themes: https://hexo.io/themes/
theme: theme_name
  4. hexo clean && hexo g && hexo s
  5. hexo d

This article refered to https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/114195340.
